name: Visible Mending 101
description:
You can bring something you’d like to mend, or practice on fabric scraps as we explore simple techniques like darning, and patchwork.

Visible mending shows that repairing is not just practical, but beautiful. It's a way to care for our clothes, extend their life, and add a touch of personality and colour along the way.

All materials will be provided, but feel free to bring your own garment to work on.

name: Yoga + sound bowl experience at the Van Gogh Immersive exhibition
description:
Yoga + Guided Breathing + Sound Bowls + Journaling… in an art masterpiece. 🎨✨

You don’t want to miss this one-of-a-kind experience happening right here in Bangalore!

And the best part : you will get your own Wiselife yoga mat at the event !!

Date: 23rd August (Saturday)

Time: 8:30 am

Location: The Van Gogh Immersive Exhibition, Bhartiya Mall of Bangalore

Movement, mindfulness, and creativity — all surrounded by the magic of Van Gogh’s art.

location.address: Bhartiya Mall Of Bengaluru, Thanisandra, Bangalore

name: Deadly Dozen- SIS x Hyfit
description:
Get ready for the Deadly Dozen — a first-of-its-kind, women-only fitness experience in India. This powerful session combines circuit workouts, strength training, and explosive movements in a format that’s also beginner-friendly. Whether you’re just starting out or looking to level up your fitness game, this event is designed to push your limits while keeping you supported every step of the way.
Date: 23rd August
Time: 10:30 AM onwards
Location: HYFIT Fitness Club, HSR Layout, Bangalore
Expect a high-energy atmosphere, expert-led sessions, and a community of like-minded women coming together to train, sweat, and thrive. Don’t miss your chance to be part of this empowering movement.

name: Chopstick & Chill!
description:
🥢 Your Friday night just got an upgrade.
Soju cocktails, fiery tteokbokki, and a big community table — all in one playful supper experience.

📅 29th Aug | 7:30 PM onwards
📍 The Fatty Bao, Indiranagar
🎟 Limited seats. Book now before they’re gone.

name: Mat Pilates and Gua Sha session
description:
Take a well-deserved pause from your busy schedule and join us for a rejuvenating experience designed to bring harmony back into your life. This is more than just a wellness session — it's a journey into mindful self-care, combining powerful movement, ancient beauty rituals, and nourishing food in a supportive, uplifting environment.

🌿 What to Expect:

Mat Pilates Session:
Build strength from the inside out with a guided Mat Pilates practice that focuses on core stability, posture alignment, and deep muscular engagement. Perfect for relieving tension, improving strength & flexibility, and increasing body awareness — this powerful and effective workout supports a resilient and balanced body.

Gua Sha Workshop:
Learn simple but powerful techniques to tone, lift, and relax facial muscles. Facial massage helps reduce signs of stress and aging naturally, while Gua Sha promotes lymphatic drainage, boosts circulation, and enhances your natural glow. A mindful beauty practice that helps you feel radiant inside and out.

Community & Connection - wellness is even more powerful when we grow together !
Meet like-minded individuals and explore the concept of Soonsu—our vision for holistic beauty and balance. Your voice matters, and we’d love your feedback.

🛍️ And don’t forget — you’ll leave with a wellness goodie bag filled with little luxuries to continue your self-care journey at home!

name: Mat Pilates and EFT Tapping
description:
Take a well-deserved pause from your busy schedule and join us for a rejuvenating experience designed to bring harmony back into your life. This is more than just a wellness session — it's a journey into mindful self-care, combining powerful movement, ancient beauty rituals, and nourishing food in a supportive, uplifting environment.

🌿 What to Expect:

Mat Pilates Session
Build strength from the inside out with a guided Mat Pilates practice that focuses on core stability, posture alignment, and deep muscular engagement. Perfect for relieving tension, improving strength & flexibility, and increasing body awareness — this powerful and effective workout supports a resilient and balanced body.

EFT Tapping
Learn the science and basics of EFT Tapping (Emotional Freedom Techniques)—a powerful mind-body tool that combines gentle tapping on acupressure points with mindful focus on emotions. Often called “emotional acupuncture without needles”.

EFT helps release stress, reduce anxiety, and restore emotional balance
In this session you will learn how to apply EFT in daily life for long-term well-being

Community & Connection - wellness is even more powerful when we grow together !
Meet like-minded individuals and explore the concept of Soonsu—our vision for holistic beauty and balance. Your voice matters, and we’d love your feedback.


🛍️ And don’t forget — you’ll leave with a wellness goodie bag filled with little luxuries to continue your self-care journey at home!

name: Glow & Ground : Korean Beauty & Sound Healing
description:
Take a mindful pause from your hectic routine and immerse yourself in an experience that nurtures your skin, soothes your soul, and connects you with a vibrant wellness community. This unique session blends the wisdom of Korean skincare with the healing power of sound for a holistic journey of self-care.

🌿 What’s Included in This Transformative Session:

K-Beauty 101: Skin Education & Product Rituals
Learn the essentials of Korean skincare and understand how to truly care for your skin. From identifying your unique skin type to mastering layering techniques and choosing the right products, this session empowers you with the knowledge to create a simple yet effective daily skincare routine.

✨ Why it matters: No two skins are the same - Great skincare starts with understanding your unique skin—not just following trends.

DIY Korean Face Mask Making
Get hands-on and create your own custom natural Korean-inspired face mask using yulmu or mud — known for cooling the skin (which helps slow signs of aging), calming irritation, and brightening the complexion. It’s a playful and personalized way to connect with your skincare on a deeper level.

You will also be guided through a gentle sound healing meditation designed to calm your nervous system, release stress, and bring your mind, body, and soul into harmony together with a Korean sheet mask to get you glowing at the end of the session !

Community & Connection - wellness is even more powerful when we grow together !
Meet like-minded individuals and explore the concept of Soonsu—our vision for holistic beauty and balance. Your voice matters, and we’d love your feedback.

🛍️ And don’t forget — you’ll leave with a wellness goodie bag filled with little luxuries to continue your self-care journey at home!

This session is perfect for you if you:

✔️ Want to learn practical, effective skincare habits

✔️ Are curious about holistic beauty, Korean wellness rituals and secrets behind glass skin

✔️ Seek balance for your body, skin, and soul

✔️ Love the idea of nourishing food, relaxing rituals, and authentic connection
